Articles.Content:
this is a space shuttle i have made

REMEMBER TO TURN THE **SAS** AND **RCS** ON OR FACE DEATH

u will need these mods:

NOVA PUNCH

C7

KW CHALLENGER

MAYBE SOME OTHER BUT I CANT REMEMBER

Any way

you will need version 0.13 onwards to download this craft

Here is a link to a video that i made of the craft: please reply
